children.question: So the problem is cornering. Can you add more details?
children.typical_answer: My car is struggling in corners while turning

children.question: So you are understeering. Does this happen on slow or fast corners?
children.typical_answer: I'm going too wide in corner

children.question: Okay, what about stability, can we sacrifice it for more grip in slow corners?
children.typical_answer: slow
solutions: Add more negative camber to your front tyres

children.question: Okay, we can easy fix it but you will be slower on straights, are you ok with this?
children.typical_answer: fast

children.question: Well maybe you can specify: Do you understeer while enterning or exiting corner?
children.typical_answer: I don't know, maybe both

children.question: So you are Oversteering. Does this happen on fast or slow corners?
children.typical_answer: I'm spinning in corners

children.question: Ok, are you willing to lower ride height or this can cause a problem?
children.typical_answer: slow

children.question: Ok, can we lose some top speed to fix that?
children.typical_answer: fast
solutions: Add more negative camber on the rear

children.question: So your car struggle on straights. Can you add more details?
children.typical_answer: I feel slower in straights, have no power

children.question: Not reaching top speed? Tell me about your grip in corners?
children.typical_answer: My top speed is lower than opponents

children.question: So we can lose some traction to get speed, you prefer more under or oversteer
children.typical_answer: It's good, I have good control of car

children.question: We can lower your ride height, Does your car hits road during braking?
children.typical_answer: I don't know its okay but nothing special
solutions: lower ride height in front and rear

children.question: To maintain current level of grip and gain top speed we can modify gearing, are you willing to lose some acceleration to gain speed?
children.typical_answer: I have some grip, but I want it to stay as it is
solutions: You can lower final gear ratio, and on least gears, avoid lowering on 1st and 2nd

children.question: Your car isn't stable, What about other situations? Is it stable during braking, acceleration or cornering?
children.typical_answer: Car feels really tricky and unstable on straights

children.question: Problem with braking? You prefer more over or understeer?
children.typical_answer: during braking
solutions: Turn brake bias more on the front

children.question: Problem with acceleration? What about your top speed can we sacrifice it?
children.typical_answer: Car is accelerating slowly
solutions: You can raise gear ratios on 1st, 2nd and 3rd gears

children.question: You need also top speed, okay, Does your car have turbo?
children.typical_answer: no

children.question: So you got problems on different surface or in rain. Can you add more details?
children.typical_answer: Car is really bouncy, and it loses grip in rain and gravel

children.question: So you are racing on track but car can't handle bumps and curbs, what about cornering, does it also struggle?
children.typical_answer: When I touch curbs or uneven track I lose control over a car

children.question: Dampers
children.typical_answer: yes, that's the problem with curbs

children.question: Antiroll bar
children.typical_answer: yes even without bumpy road

children.question: Springs
children.typical_answer: no

children.question: Is it problem with rain or you are in the offroad car?
children.typical_answer: No traction in bad conditions

children.question: To increase grip in rain we can change compound, but the car will be slower when track drys is it ok?
children.typical_answer: yes the problem is in rain
solutions: Change tyre compound for wet or intermediate

children.question: Offroad corners right?, You prefer to take corners smoothly or aggressively?
children.typical_answer: I'm driving in offroad
solutions: Stiffer the differencial and Anti-roll bars

children.question: Drifting
children.typical_answer: It's not about that, I want to drift properly

children.question: Camber
Toe
Differencial
Antiroll bar
You can't get the feel of brakes. Can you add more detail?
children.typical_answer: I Lose grip while braking

children.question: Do you lose your rear during braking or just lock front tyres and can't turn
children.typical_answer: I'm locking my tyres while braking
solutions: Transfer brake bias to front tyres
Transfer brake bias to the rear

children.question: Maybe we can lower brake pressure, or you still need fast braking?
children.typical_answer: I don't know, I just lose grip
